title: PHPmysqli close()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPmysqli close()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example - Object Oriented style
content_sections.code:
<?php
$mysqli = new mysqli("localhost","my_user","my_password","my_db");
if ($mysqli -> connect_errno) {
echo "Failed to connect to MySQL: " . $mysqli -> connect_error;
exit();
}
// ....some PHP code...
$mysqli -> close();
?>
content_sections.explanation: Example of example - object oriented style

content_sections.title: Example - Procedural style
content_sections.code:
<?php
$con=mysqli_connect("localhost","my_user","my_password","my_db");
if (mysqli_connect_errno()) {
echo "Failed to connect to MySQL: " . mysqli_connect_error();
exit;
}
// ....some PHP code...
mysqli_close($con);
?>
